name: PyLint
description: Executes PyLint against your Python 3 code base
author: Darren Fuller
helpMarkDown: Executes [PyLint](https://www.pylint.org) against the space seperated list of modules

inputs.name: reqfile
inputs.label: Pip requirements file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Install additional packages from the given requirements file

inputs.name: modules
inputs.label: Modules
inputs.helpMarkDown: A space seperate list of modules to run PyLint against
